BLOCK_LOOKING_AT.desc: Flint is used to make tools

Use an axe to chop. 
Sneak and chop to chop whole tree at once

TOOLTIP.desc:
Use redstone to power 
your devices

INFO.desc: Gravel can be found on cliff faces

DIMENSION.desc:
You have Entered the Nether. 
This place is very dangerous. Keep armor, a sword, and a bow handy. 
Also very hot
